about_the_game:
A long time ago, 6 spirits of the Color Spectrum banded together to protect all of the knowledge in the universe. They called it the Color Spectrum Door. Where it or the 6 spirits lay are unknown, but The Michael Black is going to attempt to open the Color Spectrum Door. Logan Young Junior and his friends must stop their old friend The Michael Black in his attempt to open the Color Spectrum Door; complete missions, solve complex puzzles, make impactful decisions, dig through lore, unlock secrets and dive into the story of Prophecy of The Color Spectrum!

  • Multiple Endings
  • 6+ Playable Characters
  • 85+ Achievements
  • Freeplay

content_descriptors.notes: Contains Strong Language, Fantasy Violence and Crude Humor, No Nudity or Sexual Content.
